categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order organizations

nodes.text: The Coalition for Improvements was an agency that was part of the Galactic Empire's COMPNOR organization. It was responsible for implementing long-term methods to realign wayward star systems back to the principles of the New Order. Important systems were approached with subtlety, while unimportant and remote systems usually saw darker techniques to make them compliant. The Coalition for Progress reported information about cultural shifts against the New Order to the Coalition for Improvements.
